name: Daily Activities
description: Duas related to everyday activities like waking up, dressing, and undressing.

name: Hygiene
description: Duas for activities related to personal hygiene, such as entering and leaving the restroom, and performing ablution.

name: Prayer
description: Duas associated with prayer, including hearing the Athan, entering and leaving the mosque, and completing prayers.

name: Emotional Well-being
description: Duas for emotional support, such as dealing with fear, loneliness, depression, and anger.

name: Protection
description: Duas for seeking protection from harm, enemies, and evil.

name: Spiritual Focus
description: Duas to enhance spiritual focus, such as seeking forgiveness, avoiding distractions during prayer, and fearing Shirk.

name: Personal Challenges
description: Duas for overcoming difficulties, failures, and disliked events.

name: Family
description: Duas related to family, such as seeking protection for children.

name: End of Life
description: Duas for situations related to death, such as encouraging the dying person and closing the eyes of the deceased.

name: Funeral
description: Duas for funeral-related activities, including prayers for boys and girls, placing the dead in the grave, and visiting graves.

name: Natural Phenomena
description: Duas for natural events like thunder, rain, and wind.

name: Eating
description: Duas related to eating and drinking, such as before meals and after drinking milk.

name: Social Interactions
description: Duas for social situations, such as responding to greetings, praising others, and expressing gratitude.

name: Marriage
description: Duas related to marriage, such as for the groom and before intercourse.

name: Financial
description: Duas for financial matters, such as receiving a loan.

name: Travel
description: Duas for traveling, including entering a town, riding a vehicle, and returning from a journey.

name: Hajj & Umrah
description: Duas specific to Hajj and Umrah, such as standing at Safa and Marwah and on the day of Arafat.

name: Health
description: Duas for health-related situations, such as feeling pain in the body.

name: Sacrifice
description: Duas for slaughtering or sacrificing an animal.

name: Seasonal
description: Duas for seasonal events, such as seeing the first dates of the season.
